text:
Woopra (http://www.woopra.com/) - San Francisco, CA Leading customer analytics company.

We just moved to a new bigger space in the heart of SoMa SF (1 block away from the caltrain station). We're looking to fill a few positions:

* Frontend Engineer

* Sysop Engineer

* Software Engineer (Java)

* UI/UX Designer

* Sales Specialist

To apply, visit http://www.woopra.com/careers/ or email us at careers@woopra.com.
